mapper.select: /* [chn.bhmc.dms.crm.dmm.service.dao.BlueMembershipCalcDAO.selectBluePointInfosCondition] */ SELECT DLR_CD ,CUST_NO ,SUM(SAVE_POINT_VAL) AS TOTAL_SAVE_POINT_VAL ,SUM(EMPLOY_POINT_VAL) AS TOTAL_EMPLOY_POINT_VAL FROM ( SELECT A.DLR_CD ,A.CUST_NO ,OCCR_POINT_VAL AS SAVE_POINT_VAL ,0 AS EMPLOY_POINT_VAL ,B.OCCR_DT AS OCCR_DT FROM CR_0101T A INNER JOIN CR_0808T B ON A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND A.CUST_NO = B.CUST_NO AND A.BLUE_MEMBERSHIP_NO = B.BLUE_MEMBERSHIP_NO WHERE B.POINT_TP = '+' AND A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND A.CUST_NO = #{sCustNo} UNION ALL SELECT A.DLR_CD ,A.CUST_NO ,0 AS SAVE_POINT_VAL ,OCCR_POINT_VAL AS EMPLOY_POINT_VAL ,B.OCCR_DT AS OCCR_DT FROM CR_0101T A INNER JOIN CR_0808T B ON A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND A.CUST_NO = B.CUST_NO AND A.BLUE_MEMBERSHIP_NO = B.BLUE_MEMBERSHIP_NO WHERE B.POINT_TP = '-' AND A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND A.CUST_NO = #{sCustNo} ) GROUP BY DLR_CD, CUST_NO
